mnd16:269.12_1: pahānāya vūpasamāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipassaddhiyā adhisīlampi sikkheyya adhicittampi sikkheyya adhipaññampi
mnd16:269.13_0: sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikaronto sikkheyya ācareyya samācareyya samādāya vatteyyāti—
mnd16:270.1_0: Rūpesu saddesu atho rasesu, gandhesu phassesu sahetha rāganti.

mnd16:270.3_0: rūpesu saddesu atho rasesu, gandhesu phassesu sahetha rāgaṁ.
mnd16:274.2_0: Etesūti rūpesu saddesu gandhesu rasesu phoṭṭhabbesu.
mnd16:274.3_0: Chandoti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasneho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṁ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṁ …pe…
mnd16:274.6_0: Etesu dhammesu chandaṁ vineyya paṭivineyya pajaheyya vinodeyya byantiṁ kareyya anabhāvaṁ gameyyāti—
mnd16:275.2_0: Bhikkhūti puthujjanakalyāṇako vā bhikkhu, sekho vā bhikkhu.
mnd16:275.3_0: Satimāti yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo ekāyanamaggo—
mnd16:276.2_0: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa nīvaraṇehi cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttaṁ,

mnd16:276.4_0: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa pītiyā ca cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttaṁ,
mnd16:276.5_0: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa sukhadukkhehi cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttaṁ;
mnd16:276.6_0: ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samāpannassa rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttaṁ,
mnd16:276.9_0: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samāpannassa ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttaṁ;
mnd16:276.10_0: sotāpannassa sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vicikicchāya sīlabbataparāmāsā diṭṭhānusayā vicikicchānusayā tadekaṭṭhehi ca kilesehi cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttaṁ,
mnd16:276.11_0: sakadāgāmissa oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā tadekaṭṭhehi ca kilesehi cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttaṁ,
mnd16:276.12_0: anāgāmissa anusahagatā kāmarāgasaṁyojanā paṭighasaṁyojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā tadekaṭṭhehi
mnd16:276.12_1: ca kilesehi cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttaṁ,
mnd16:276.13_0: arahato rūparāgā arūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā tadekaṭṭhehi
mnd16:276.13_1: ca kilesehi bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi cittaṁ muttaṁ vimuttaṁ suvimuttanti—
mnd16:277.2_0: Kālenāti uddhate citte samathassa kālo, samāhite citte vipassanāya kālo.
mnd16:286.1_0: Ekodibhūto vihane tamaṁ so, iti bhagavāti.

mnd16:286.4_1: acakkhukaraṇaṁ aññāṇakaraṇaṁ paññānirodhikaṁ vighātapakkhikaṁ anibbānasaṁvattanikaṁ haneyya vihaneyya
mnd16:286.4_2: pajaheyya vinodeyya byantiṁ kareyya anabhāvaṁ gameyya.

mnd16:287.2_20: kataṁ na ñātisālohitehi kataṁ na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṁ na devatāhi kataṁ;
